favourite.article:
All my sin and death... must yield Now Lord, I am healed In my spirit You are so real All I know is I want to keep touching You.
Praise the Lord!

This is really a wonderful song. Glad I found this lyrics, and I can now sing this with music. Thank You Lord, by Your touch I'm healed. All my sin and death must yield. In my spirit You are so real. I never want to leave You. I really need You Lord.
I like this hymn. Is there a chance that we I can hear this tune? Christ is our Life!
